00004 void TileInit(Tile *tile, u8 width, u8 height)
00005 {
00006       tile->Width = width;
00007       tile->Height = height;
00008       
00009       tile->Blocks = new Block[width*height];
00010 }

00012 void TileDestroy(Tile *tile)
00013 {
00014       delete[] tile->Blocks;
00015 }

00017 void TileRotate180(Tile *tile)
00018 {
00019       Block *oldBlocks = tile->Blocks;
00020 
00021       tile->Blocks = new Block[tile->Width*tile->Height];
00022 
00023       for(u16 i = 0; i < tile->Width*tile->Height; ++i)
00024       {
00025             tile->Blocks[i] = oldBlocks[tile->Width*tile->Height-1-i];
00026       }
00027 
00028       delete[] oldBlocks;
00029 }

00031 void TileRotateRight(Tile *tile)
00032 {
00033       Block *oldBlocks = tile->Blocks;
00034 
00035       tile->Blocks = new Block[tile->Width*tile->Height];
00036 
00037       u8 oldHeight = tile->Height, oldWidth = tile->Width;
00038 
00039       tile->Width = oldHeight;
00040 
00041       tile->Height = oldWidth;
00042 
00043       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < tile->Height; ++i)
00044       {
00045             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < tile->Width; ++j)
00046             {
00047                   tile->Blocks[i*tile->Width + j] = oldBlocks[(oldHeight-1-j)*oldWidth + i];
00048             }
00049       }
00050 
00051       delete[] oldBlocks;
00052 }
